context:
Giving Tuesday takes place on November 28, 2023. The George Brown College Foundation participates in this global day of philanthropy and encourages donations to support students enrolled in bridging programs across the college. Donations made to the Anne Sado Bridging to Opportunity Endowment will have 100% of the amount going towards George Brown College students, with no processing or administration fees applied. Donors will receive a tax receipt for donations over $20 by email. To learn more about the foundation, contact Gabriella Goutam at 416-415-5000 ext. 3289 or visit the Foundation website. The college also has a land acknowledgment and offers application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and other updates which can be signed up for on their website. Contact information: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Social media hub is also available.

Additionally, the text includes mention of "Bridging programs" which are post-secondary programs that recognize students with prior experience in their pursuit of further education.
